attributes.action: Contact Details On Microchips Must Remain Registered For Life #TuksLaw
attributes.additional_details:
No removal of any keeper without written consent & RBU registration to remain for the lifetime of the animal

Vets/rescues/charities/police to contact RBU registration/keeper on the microchip if an animals life is at risk of euthanasia in a non emergency inc. seized & straying

Vet practices to register RBU on practice databases

Reg. keepers to have access to info on treatment, euthanasia, disposal of bodies

Pet crematoriums to scan & log microchip number prior to cremation for identification
attributes.background: Rescue Back Up contact details are registered on microchips to protect animals in times of vulnerability. Rescue organisations & responsible breeders who register their ongoing interest are let down by database companies who are changing and/or removing these details without notification/permission

departments.name: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs

signatures_by_constituency.mp: Rt Hon Sir Oliver Heald QC MP
signatures_by_constituency.name: North East Hertfordshire
